statusLine.command: input=$(cat); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); basename_dir=$(basename "$current_dir"); model_name=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); if [ -d "$current_dir/.git" ]; then cd "$current_dir" && git_branch=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null) && git_status=$(git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null | wc -l | tr -d ' ') && if [ "$git_status" -gt 0 ]; then git_indicator="*"; else git_indicator=""; fi && printf "\033[2m%s · \033[36m%s%s\033[2m · \033[35m%s\033[0m" "$basename_dir" "$git_branch" "$git_indicator" "$model_name"; else printf "\033[2m%s · \033[35m%s\033[0m" "$basename_dir" "$model_name"; fi
